title: How to Make Ham and Cheese Roll Ups

steps.headline: Set out the crescent roll pastry.
steps.description: If you plan to make 8 roll-ups, get out all of the crescent roll pastry. If you plan to make 4, only use half of the crescent roll pastry.

steps.headline: Roll out the crescent rolls as shown here.
steps.description: Take care not to tear them as you unfold and pull apart the triangles.

steps.headline: Take half a slice of cheese, and lay it on each of the crescent rolls.
steps.description: For those allergic to dairy products, skip this step and move on to the next one.

steps.headline: Add the ham.
steps.description: Add as much ham as you'd like. For vegetarians, skip this step and simply rely on the cheese from the previous step.

steps.headline: Roll them up.
steps.description: From the widest part, roll the crescent pastry up to the thinner part. See the image for detail.

steps.headline: Arrange the ham and cheese roll-ups on the baking sheet (tray).
steps.description: Place the completed ham and cheese roll-ups in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until they turn golden brown. Take them out when they're done with an oven mitt. Wait at least five minutes before eating. After that, enjoy and eat up!

text: Set out the crescent roll pastry. If you plan to make 8 roll-ups, get out all of the crescent roll pastry. If you plan to make 4, only use half of the crescent roll pastry. Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Roll out the crescent rolls as shown here. Take care not to tear them as you unfold and pull apart the triangles. Take half a slice of cheese, and lay it on each of the crescent rolls. For those allergic to dairy products, skip this step and move on to the next one. Add the ham. Add as much ham as you'd like. For vegetarians, skip this step and simply rely on the cheese from the previous step. Roll them up. From the widest part, roll the crescent pastry up to the thinner part. See the image for detail. Arrange the ham and cheese roll-ups on the baking sheet (tray). Place the completed ham and cheese roll-ups in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until they turn golden brown. Take them out when they're done with an oven mitt. Wait at least five minutes before eating. After that, enjoy and eat up! Finished.
